name: Embed Audiobakers
author: audiobakers

sections.description:
Audiobakers is the place for artists to effortlessly share and sell their music and for fans to discover and download free songs and albums.

With this plugin all you need to do is copy the above shortcode and then replace the ‘PUT YOUR LINK HERE WITHOUT THE IFRAME’ with your embed link from audiobakers.com without including the iframe tag <ifram> & </ifame>.
This plugin will embed your music post to your website automatically after publish.

WordPress removes iframe html tags because of security reasons.
Audiobakers shortcode is the replacement of the iframe html tag and accepts the same params as Audiobakers html tag does.
You may use Audiobakers shortcode to embed content from Audiobakers, YouTube, Vimeo, Google Maps or from any external page.

Important: You can not embed HTTP pages into HTTPS pages and vice versa.
So the protocol (http or httpS) for parent and embedded page should match.
sections.installation:
1. install and activate the plugin on the Plugins page
  2. add shortcode [audiobakers PUT YOUR EMBED LINK HERE"] to page or post content
sections.faq:
Run into issues or have questions/suggestions?

If you have suggestions or run into an issue please email us at support@audiobakers.com
